content.webTitle: How to focus in an age of distraction: A masterclass with Silicon Valley expert Nir Eyal

fields.headline: How to focus in an age of distraction: A masterclass with Silicon Valley expert Nir Eyal
fields.bodyText: This course has now passed, but you can be the first to know about the next one - and other workshops like this - by signing up to our newsletter here. If you’re feeling bombarded by the waves of pings, dings and rings, you’re not alone. We live in an age of information. Unrelenting, constantly changing information that’s available to consumed in bitesize pieces and then forgotten. In this masterclass, bestselling author of Hooked: How to Build Habit-Forming Products Nir Eyal provides an antidote to the distraction crisis that’s affecting productivity and attention spans across the globe. With him, you will learn the findings of his five years of research, and how to master what he calls “the skill of the century”: the power to be “indistractable”. Course content Mastering the internal triggers that cause distraction How to make time for the important things in life The secrets to “hacking back” distractions Using precommitments to ensure we do as we say At the event, you will receive a free copy of Indistractable, worth £18. Tutor profile Nir Eyal lectured at Standford’s Graduate School of Business and Institute of Design. His first book, Hooked: How to Build Habit-Forming Products, is an international bestseller and taught Silicon Valley how to design behaviour. His next book, Indistractable: How to Control Your Attention and Choose Your life, reveals the Achilles heel of distraction and provides a guidebook for getting the best out of technology without letting it rule our lives.
